docs.snippet: Sipping his breakfast coffee in a cozy booth at Chez Vachon, a New Hampshire cafe favored by political junkies and a regular stop for aspirants on the campaign trail to the White House, Bill McEvoy debated the presidential future of Republican Chr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Sipping his breakfast coffee in a cozy booth at Chez Vachon, a New Hampshire cafe favored by political junkies and a regular stop for aspirants on the campaign trail to the White House, Bill McEvoy debated the presidential future of Republican Chris Christie.

headline.print_headline: Red Wings' Zetterberg Has Back Surgery, Out for Eight Weeks
headline.main: Red Wings' Zetterberg Has Back Surgery, Out for Eight Weeks

docs.snippet: Detroit Red Wings captain Henrik Zetterberg, who last week was ruled out of Sweden's bid for ice hockey glory at the Sochi Olympics with a herniated disc, had back surgery on Friday, the National Hockey League team said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Detroit Red Wings captain Henrik Zetterberg, who last week was ruled out of Sweden's bid for ice hockey glory at the Sochi Olympics with a herniated disc, had back surgery on Friday, the National Hockey League team said.

headline.print_headline: US Conservatives Praise Russia's Anti-Gay Laws
headline.main: US Conservatives Praise Russia's Anti-Gay Laws

docs.snippet: Two longtime opponents of the U.S. gay-rights movement on Friday announced formation of a coalition that will seek to persuade more countries around the world to follow Russia's example in passing laws that restrict gay rights....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two longtime opponents of the U.S. gay-rights movement on Friday announced formation of a coalition that will seek to persuade more countries around the world to follow Russia's example in passing laws that restrict gay rights.

headline.print_headline: VW CFO Sees Emerging Markets Turmoil Hitting Auto Markets

headline.print_headline: Ukraine Crowds Want Yanukovich Out Despite Political Deal
headline.main: Ukraine Crowds Want Yanukovich Out Despite Political Deal

docs.snippet: Emotional crowds on Kiev's Independence Square rounded on opposition leaders on Friday after they signed an agreement with President Viktor Yanukovich to end a protracted crisis, and said they would not wait any longer for him to go....
